Detailed Description

SPuzzleSpan.

Description: The SPuzzleSpan struct publicly contains all the information needed to define all possible link combinations between two nodes in a puzzle graph.

Limitations: None

SPuzzleSpan::~SPuzzleSpan (   ) 
 

SPuzzleSpan::~SPuzzleSpan.

Description: This is the destructor for the span struct. It removes itself from the list of spans contained within both of its node connections.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The span has been removed from both node's span lists.
Limitations: None
